help:
*Help message*
Bot version: `{version}`
`{prefix}prefix` - change or view current server's prefix
`{prefix}server add` - add ARK server to bot's list
`{prefix}server info` - view info about server
`{prefix}server delete` - delete server from bot's list
`{prefix}list` - write list of added servers to bot's list
`{prefix}info` - all info about this bot (also useful links)
`{prefix}watch` - bot will send notification if your server goes down !
cant_change_prefix: You can`t change prefix in DM.
share_msg: Here is link {} to invite me to our server!
no_servers_added: No Servers added to bot's list ! You can add one with `{}server add`.
